scripts.build: for d in $(ls -F | grep / | grep -v -E '^node_modules|public'); do mkdir -p public/$d && marp --html --input-dir $d --output public/$d; done
scripts.postbuild: for d in $(ls -F | grep / | grep -v -E '^node_modules|public'); do mkdir -p public/$d/img && if [ -d $d/img/ ]; then cp -R $d/img/ public/$d; fi; done
